DESCRIPTION: manages and gives information about archives
system usage information and displays processes
protects machines from accidental shutdowns/reboots (via ssh)
tools to display information from /proc and /sys
FUSE-based filesystem client for mounting remote directories
terminal browser which can also view images
download any YouTube video/playlist/channel) when given the link
image viewer that also sets the wallpaper
Command-line JSON processor (used in a script)
can take quick screenshots at your request
turns on NumLock when you login
window action utilities on the command line (maim)
